main event: Observers from a B-29 aircraft at Shemya AFB sighted a blue-white light moving at high speed on the night of 29 March 1949.
interesting points: The light was observed passing approximately 100 feet below the aircraft,The light exhibited characteristics similar to that of an exhaust flame,Several witnesses described seeing the object at altitudes ranging from 2400 to 5000 feet,All reports indicated a high speed of travel,Various witnesses noted that the light's behavior dismissed the possibility of it being a meteor.
sighted object: blue-white light resembling an exhaust flame
witness description: aircraft crew members from the 375th Reconnaissance Squadron
